en.title: JWL Travel Gear - Premium Bag Manufacturer
en.description: Professional bag and luggage manufacturing. OEM/ODM services for global brands.

zh.title: 启东金万利 - 高端箱包制造商
zh.description: 专业的箱包和行李箱制造。为全球品牌提供 OEM/ODM 服务。

title.en: Premium Bag Manufacturer with Years of Expertise
title.zh: 多年专业箱包制造经验

subtitle.en: Your trusted partner for high-quality custom bags and luggage. Serving global brands with precision and care.
subtitle.zh: 您值得信赖的高品质定制箱包合作伙伴。以精湛工艺服务全球知名品牌。

title.en: Premium Bag Manufacturer with Years of Expertise
title.zh: 多年专业箱包制造经验

subtitle.en: Your trusted partner for high-quality custom bags and luggage. Serving global brands with precision and care.
subtitle.zh: 您值得信赖的高品质定制箱包合作伙伴。以精湛工艺服务全球知名品牌。

subtitle.en: From concept to creation, we bring your vision to life with precision manufacturing.
subtitle.zh: 从概念到创造，我们通过精密制造将您的愿景变为现实。

subtitle.en: Reliable shipping to USA, Europe, and Asia. We handle the complexities so you don't have to.
subtitle.zh: 可靠运往美国、欧洲和亚洲。我们处理复杂事务，让您无后顾之忧。

subtitle.en: Committed to responsible manufacturing with recycled materials and ethical practices.
subtitle.zh: 致力于使用再生材料和道德实践进行负责任的制造。

description.en: Qidong Jinwanli (JWL Travel Gear) is a premier bag manufacturer with a rich history of craftsmanship. Located in Qidong, we specialize in producing high-quality bags for international markets including Japan, USA, and Italy.
description.zh: 启东金万利（JWL Travel Gear）是一家拥有多年历史的顶级箱包制造商。我们位于启东，专注于为日本、美国和意大利等国际市场生产高品质箱包。

mission.en: We are dedicated to delivering superior quality, innovative designs, and reliable manufacturing services to our global partners.
mission.zh: 我们致力于为全球合作伙伴提供卓越的品质、创新的设计和可靠的制造服务。

imageDesc.en: Our modern manufacturing facility in Qidong, equipped with the latest technology and staffed by experienced professionals dedicated to quality.
imageDesc.zh: 我们位于启东的现代化制造工厂，配备了最新技术，并由致力于质量的经验丰富的专业人员组成。

subtitle.en: Equipped with advanced machinery and a skilled workforce to ensure precision and efficiency.
subtitle.zh: 配备先进的机械设备和熟练的员工队伍，确保生产的精度和效率。

desc.en: Our facility boasts a high daily output capability, meeting the demands of large-scale international orders efficiently. With multiple production lines running in parallel, we ensure timely delivery for all our clients.
desc.zh: 我们的工厂拥有极高的日产量能力，能够高效满足大规模国际订单的需求。多条生产线并行运行，确保客户订单准时交付。

desc.en: We utilize the latest sewing and cutting technology to ensure precision and durability in every product. Our investment in automation helps reduce errors and improve overall product consistency.
desc.zh: 我们利用最新的缝纫和裁剪技术，确保每件产品的精度和耐用性。我们在自动化方面的投入有助于减少误差并提高整体产品的一致性。

desc.en: A dedicated quality assurance team conducts multi-stage inspections to guarantee defect-free products. From raw material intake to final packaging, every step is monitored for quality compliance.
desc.zh: 专门的质量保证团队进行多阶段检查，以确产品零缺陷。从原材料入库到最终包装，每一步都受到严格监控以符合质量标准。

subtitle.en: We adhere to the highest international standards for quality, safety, and social responsibility.
subtitle.zh: 我们坚持最高的国际质量、安全和社会责任标准。

subtitle.en: We are proud to manufacture for some of the world's most recognized names.
subtitle.zh: 我们很荣幸为众多世界知名品牌提供代工服务。

subtitle.en: A glimpse into our extensive portfolio of manufactured products.
subtitle.zh: 浏览我们丰富的产品制造案例。

subtitle.en: From fashion to function, we manufacture a wide variety of bags.
subtitle.zh: 从时尚到功能，我们生产各种类型的包袋。

minimumOrder.en: Minimum order quantities may apply. Contact us for details.
minimumOrder.zh: 可能适用最低订购量。请联系我们了解详情。

noProducts.en: No products found in this category.

subtitle.en: Comprehensive manufacturing solutions tailored to your needs.
subtitle.zh: 为您量身定制的全面制造解决方案。

desc.en: We bring your concepts to life with our expert design team.
desc.zh: 我们的专家设计团队将您的概念转化为现实。

desc.en: High-capacity production for global brands with strict quality control.
desc.zh: 拥有严格质量控制的高产能生产线，服务全球品牌。

desc.en: Rigorous testing and inspection at every stage of production.
desc.zh: 生产每个阶段都进行严格的测试和检查。

subtitle.en: Interested in working with us? Contact our team today.
subtitle.zh: 有兴趣与我们合作吗？请立即联系我们的团队。

address.en: No.22 Huifeng Street, Huifeng Town, Qidong, Jiangsu, China
address.zh: 中国江苏省启东市汇丰镇汇丰街22号

baiduAddressDesc.en: Our factory is located in Qidong, Jiangsu, just 1.5 hours drive from Shanghai Pudong International Airport.
baiduAddressDesc.zh: 我们的工厂位于江苏启东，距离上海浦东国际机场仅1.5小时车程。

overlayDesc.en: Located just 1.5 hours from Shanghai Pudong International Airport (PVG). We offer shuttle service for visiting clients.
overlayDesc.zh: 位于上海浦东国际机场 (PVG) 仅 1.5 小时车程。我们为来访客户提供班车服务。

greeting.en: Hello! How can I help you today?
greeting.zh: 您好！请问有什么可以帮您？

askContact.en: Thank you for your inquiry. To better assist you, could you please provide your contact details?
askContact.zh: 谢谢您的咨询。为了更好地为您服务，请提供您的联系方式。

finalResponse.en: Thank you! A sales representative will review your request and contact you shortly.
finalResponse.zh: 谢谢！我们的销售代表将审核您的请求并尽快与您联系。

rights.en: © 2024 JWL Travel Gear. All rights reserved.
rights.zh: © 2024 启东金万利. 版权所有.
